data.actual_result: Able to select that server from the context menu even though clicking it doesn't send an invite
data.expected_result: No option to invite user to that server since invites are denied in every channel
data.short_description: Able to invite user to server from right click context menu when invite perms are denied by channel even though no invite gets sent
data.steps_to_repro: - Have a server where you have a role that has invite perms enabled in settings but disabled in channel settings - Right click a user that isn't in the server - Mouse over the "Invite to Server" option and observe you have the option to invite to that server - Try inviting the user to that server from the right click context menu
